item.title: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin'
item.description: Your browser does not support the video tag. In this project, my biggest task was to implemented FSM-based* enemy AI. The main objective was to create a challenging and enjoyable experience for the player. Which required that the AI must be designed to move and shoot intelligently, while also keeping in mind the enemy’s low health and the player’s long shooting range. You can learn more about the development in my blog – there’s also a post about my time as a scrum master.
